title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: A wreath hangs askew on one of the fence posts nearby, and the ribbons hanging from it are frayed and torn.  A lone goat, having strayed from the crowd, lingers suspiciously close to the fence, but seems content to stare off into the meadow, as if pointedly ignoring the tattered ribbons.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
